reviewText:
Well, the guys from Florida have done it again. The 48 hour GFC is alive and well, this DVD has all the best films from 2008. I just added this DVD to my collection! What a great concept, not to forget that these full-scale productions are done within such a short window of time. The Collection of films on this DVD simply ROCK! I really enjoyed it and can't wait for the next volume...

48hr GFC is gonna be the next Nationwide phenomena!!!

I am familiar with the 48 GFC, and I must say that 2008 was one of the best years yet!  Given the time constraints, these films truly show you how much untapped talent is out there just waiting for their big break!
